items.title: BLSH Stock Climbs Back Above IPO Price After Deutsche Bank Upgrade
items.description: According to a CNBC report, Deutsche Bank upgraded the stock to ‘Buy’ from ‘Hold’ while lowering the price target slightly to $51 from $52.

items.title: Coinbase Rolls Out Ethereum-Backed Loans – Increases BTC Loan Limit To $5 Million USDC
items.description: Last month, Coinbase surpassed $1 billion in BTC-backed on-chain loan originations in just eight months since launch.

items.title: Existing Home Sales Rise In October As Buyers Take Advantage Of Lower Mortgage Rates
items.description: According to data from the National Association of Realtors, sales of previously owned homes rose 1.2% in October over September.

items.title: Dollar Index Steadies Above 200-DMA After Crossing The Mark For First Time Since March 2025
items.description: According to the Fed minutes released on Wednesday, officials were split on whether the greater risk to the economy was a cooling labor market or high...

items.title: Dow Soars 600 Points, S&P 500 Surges 1.6% Following Nvidia’s Q3 Earnings Beat
items.description: All Magnificent 7 stocks were up at the time of writing, with Nvidia and Tesla leading with gains of nearly 4% each.
